description: Profit distribution for independent schools must be prohibited
Nuclear power must be expanded
The police must be able to establish visitation zones in crime-prone areas
The RUT deduction must be abolished
Sweden must reduce international aid
The royal family should be allocated less money
The tax on petrol and diesel must be reduced
The tax on properties must be increased
Culture must be largely financed privately
It will become more difficult for municipalities to stop wind power construction

A third legal gender must be introduced for those who identify as neither female nor male
Parents must decide for themselves how they distribute the parental leave
Private online doctors will no longer be financed by tax funds
Permanent residence permits must be the main rule in migration policy
Sweden must become be a member of NATO
The temporary increase in the A-kassa must be made permanent

The rearmament of the Swedish defense is to be financed with higher taxes
Public service - TV and radio - must have a narrower mission
New sales of petrol and diesel cars are to be banned from 2025 onwards
Grades must be compulsory from year 4
More tax income must be redistributed from rich to poor municipalities
The purchase of sexual services shall be punished with at least imprisonment
Market rents must be introduced on new tenancies
Sweden must dismantle the plans for high-speed trains
The state must take over responsibility for healthcare
The grace day must be abolished
It should be easier for employers to dismiss employees
It should be easier to get permission to open mines in Sweden
A wealth tax should be reintroduced
The RUT deduction must be greatly expanded
The amortization requirements on housing loans must be removed
The state's investment support for the construction of new housing must be removed
Sweden must be multicultural
Sweden must accept fewer refugees
Calls to prayer must be stopped
Entry level jobs with low salary for new arrivals
Gender quotas with min 40% of each gender on company boards
According to law, parental leave must be divided equally
Culture must be largely financed by private actors
Employment agency must be abolished
Small businesses are to be exempted entirely from the rules for dismissals
The tax on work must be reduced
The police must prioritize seeking out and rejecting asylum seekers who have been rejected
Abolish parole so that convicts serve out their sentences

Ban new sales of petrol and diesel cars from 2025 onwards
Disposable items made of plastic should be banned

Religious private schools should be banned

Free schools' opportunities to make a profit must be limited

Amend the Beach Protection Act so that it will be easier to build close to the beach
Redistribute more money from rich to poor municipalities
Sweden is to become a member of NATO

The state must take over responsibility for healthcare from the county councils
